Package application

Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
application.GameWindow
public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
Acts as the primary window for the BuffBud game. Displays the pet, options to interact with the pet, and messages about exercising.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) javafx.scene.layout.HBox answerPane
    The pane that holds the "yes" and "no" buttons on the bottom of the main pane.
    protected javafx.scene.image.Image backgroundImage
    The background image for the scene.
    protected javafx.scene.layout.BackgroundImage bgImage
    The view of the background image for the scene.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextArea dialogue
    The current dialogue for the dialogue display area.
    (package private) javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane dialoguePane
    The overlying pane containing the dialogue and answering panes.
    protected boolean exerciseActive
    Tells whether or not an exercise is ongoing.
    protected long exerciseTime
    Acts as placeholder for the time an exercise was started.
    protected javafx.scene.control.Button exitButton
    The save and exit button for the top toolbar.
    protected javafx.scene.control.Label healthLabel
    The label displaying pet health level for the top toolbar.
    protected javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane mainPane
    The main pane acting as the overlay for the window.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.Button noButton
    The sometimes-hidden, sometimes-showing rejection button for responding to questions in the dialogue area.
    protected javafx.scene.image.Image petImage
    The pet image for the center display.
    protected javafx.scene.image.ImageView petView
    The view of the pet image for the center display.
    protected javafx.scene.control.Button resetButton
    The reset and exit button for the top toolbar.
    protected long resetStart
    The time that a reset was originally flagged.
    protected javafx.scene.control.Button saveButton
    The save button for the top toolbar.
    protected javafx.scene.Scene scene
    The main scene for the GameWindow.
    protected javafx.stage.Stage stage
    The main stage for the display of the GameWindow.
    protected boolean successfulExercise
    Tells if an exercise was completed well.
    protected long timeOfFailure
    Acts as placeholder for the time an exercise failed.
    protected boolean toReset
    Flag for if the user has chosen to "Exit and Reset".
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.Button yesButton
    The sometimes-hidden, sometimes-showing affirmative button for responding to questions in the dialogue area.
